name: Televisio-mania
description:
A family enjoy some time together in front of the television... or do they? They battle each other to get control of the remote and change to their favorite channel.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 51 - Every 10 Seconds

Controls:
Arrows and Spacebar/Return

Every Art and Programing was done by myself.

Program used:
3D : Blender
2D : Aseprite, After Effects
Audio : Audacity, Bfxr

My Twitter : @Aesaris
My Artstation : Akkara
